original: oṃ
analyzed: om

original: mano hi dvividhaṃ proktaṃ śuddhaṃ cāśuddham eva ca /
analyzed: manaḥ hi dvividham proktam śuddham ca aśuddham eva ca

original: aśuddhaṃ kāmasaṃkalpaṃ śuddhaṃ kāmavivarjitam // BrbUp_1 //
analyzed: aśuddham kāma saṃkalpam śuddham kāma vivarjitam

original: mana eva manuṣyāṇāṃ kāraṇaṃ bandhamokṣayoḥ /
analyzed: manaḥ eva manuṣyāṇām kāraṇam bandha mokṣayoḥ

original: bandhāya viṣayāsaktaṃ muktyai nirviṣayaṃ smṛtam // BrbUp_2 //
analyzed: bandhāya viṣaya āsaktam muktyai nirviṣayam smṛtam

original: yato nirviṣayasyāsya manaso muktir iṣyate /
analyzed: yatas nirviṣayasya asya manasaḥ muktiḥ iṣyate

original: tasmān nirviṣayaṃ nityaṃ manaḥ kāryaṃ mumukṣuṇā // BrbUp_3 //
analyzed: tasmāt nirviṣayam nityam manaḥ kāryam mumukṣuṇā

original: nirastaviṣayāsaṅgaṃ saṃniruddhaṃ mano hṛdi /
analyzed: nirasta viṣaya āsaṅgam saṃniruddham manaḥ hṛdi

original: yadā yāty unmanībhāvaṃ tadā tat paramamadam // BrbUp_4 //
analyzed: yadā yāti unmanībhāvam tadā tat parama madam

original: tāvad eva niroddhavyaṃ yāvaddhṛdi gataṃ kṣayam /
analyzed: tāvat eva niroddhavyam yāvat hṛdi gatam kṣayam

original: etaj jñānaṃ ca mokṣaṃ ca ato 'nyo granthavistaraḥ // BrbUp_5 //
analyzed: etat jñānam ca mokṣam ca atas nyaḥ grantha vistaraḥ

original: naiva cintyaṃ na cācintyam acintyaṃ cintyam eva ca /
analyzed: na eva cintyam na ca acintyam acintyam cintyam eva ca

original: pakṣapātavinirmuktaṃ brahma sampadyate tadā // BrbUp_6 //
analyzed: pakṣapāta vinirmuktam brahma sampadyate tadā

original: svareṇa saṃdhayed yogam asvaraṃ bhāvayet param /
analyzed: svareṇa saṃdhayet yogam asvaram bhāvayet param

original: asvareṇa hi bhāvena bhāvo nābhāva iṣyate // BrbUp_7 //
analyzed: a svareṇa hi bhāvena bhāvaḥ na abhāvaḥ iṣyate

original: tad eva niṣkalaṃ brahma nirvikalpaṃ nirañjanam /
analyzed: tat eva niṣkalam brahma nirvikalpam nirañjanam

original: tad brahmāham iti jñātvā brahma sampadyate dhruvam // BrbUp_8 //
analyzed: tat brahma aham iti jñātvā brahma sampadyate dhruvam

original: nirvikalpam anantaṃ ca hetudṛṣṭāntavarjitam /
analyzed: nirvikalpam anantam ca hetu dṛṣṭānta varjitam

original: aprameyam anādyaṃ ca jñātvā ca paramaṃ śivam // BrbUp_9 //
analyzed: aprameyam anādyam ca jñātvā ca paramam śivam

original: na nirodho na cotpattir na vandyo na ca śāsanam /
analyzed: na nirodhaḥ na ca utpattiḥ na vandyaḥ na ca śāsanam

original: na mumukṣā na muktiś ca ity eṣā paramārthatā // BrbUp_10 //
analyzed: na mumukṣā na muktiḥ ca iti eṣā parama artha tā

original: eka evātmā mantavyo jāgratsvapnasuṣuptiṣu /
analyzed: ekaḥ eva ātmā mantavyaḥ jāgrat svapna suṣuptiṣu

original: sthānatrayād vyatītasya punarjanma na vidyate // BrbUp_11 //
analyzed: sthāna trayāt vyatītasya punarjanma na vidyate

original: eka eva hi bhūtātmā bhūte bhūte vyavasthitaḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ eva hi bhūtātmā bhūte bhūte vyavasthitaḥ

original: ekadhā bahudhā caiva dṛśyate jalacandravat // BrbUp_12 //
analyzed: ekadhā bahudhā ca eva dṛśyate jala candra vat

original: ghaṭasaṃbhṛtam ākāśaṃ līyamāne ghaṭe yathā /
analyzed: ghaṭa saṃbhṛtam ākāśam līyamāne ghaṭe yathā

original: ghaṭo līyeta nākāśaṃ tadvaj jīvo ghaṭopamaḥ // BrbUp_13 //
analyzed: ghaṭaḥ līyeta na ākāśam tadvat jīvaḥ ghaṭa upamaḥ

original: ghaṭavad vividhākāraṃ bhidyamānaṃ punaḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: ghaṭa vat vividha ākāram bhidyamānam punar punar

original: tadbhagnaṃ na ca jānāti sa jānāti ca nityaśaḥ // BrbUp_14 //
analyzed: tat bhagnam na ca jānāti sa jānāti ca nityaśas

original: śabdamāyāvṛto yāvat tāvat tiṣṭhati puṣkare /
analyzed: śabda māyā āvṛtaḥ yāvat tāvat tiṣṭhati puṣkare

original: bhinne tamasi caikatvam ekam evānupaśyati // BrbUp_15 //
analyzed: bhinne tamasi ca eka tvam ekam eva anupaśyati

original: śabdākṣaraṃ paraṃ brahma yasmin kṣīṇe yad akṣaram /
analyzed: śabda akṣaram param brahma yasmin kṣīṇe yat akṣaram

original: tad vidvān akṣaraṃ dhyāyed yadīcchecchāntim ātmanaḥ // BrbUp_16 //
analyzed: tat vidvān akṣaram dhyāyet yadi icchet śāntim ātmanaḥ

original: dve vidye veditavye tu śabdabrahma paraṃ ca yat /
analyzed: dve vidye veditavye tu śabdabrahma param ca yat

original: śabdabrahmaṇi niṣṇātaḥ paraṃ brahmādhigacchati // BrbUp_17 //
analyzed: śabdabrahmaṇi niṣṇātaḥ param brahma adhigacchati

original: grantham abhyasya medhāvī jñānavijñānatattvataḥ /
analyzed: grantham abhyasya medhāvī jñāna vijñāna tattvataḥ

original: palālam iva dhānyārthī tyajed grantham aśeṣataḥ // BrbUp_18 //
analyzed: palālam iva dhānya arthī tyajet grantham aśeṣatas

original: gavām anekavarṇānāṃ kṣīrasyāpy ekavarṇatā /
analyzed: gavām aneka varṇānām kṣīrasya api eka varṇa tā

original: kṣīravat paśyate jñānaṃ liṅginas tu gavāṃ yathā // BrbUp_19 //
analyzed: kṣīra vat paśyate jñānam liṅginaḥ tu gavām yathā

original: ghṛtam iva payasi nigūḍhaṃ bhūte bhūte ca vasati vijñānam /
analyzed: ghṛtam iva payasi nigūḍham bhūte bhūte ca vasati vijñānam

original: satataṃ manthayitavyaṃ manasā manthānabhūtena // BrbUp_20 //
analyzed: satatam manthayitavyam manasā manthāna bhūtena

original: jñānanetraṃ samādāya cared vahnim ataḥ param /
analyzed: jñānanetram samādāya caret vahnim atas param

original: niṣkalaṃ nirmalaṃ śāntaṃ tad brahmāham iti smṛtam // BrbUp_21 //
analyzed: niṣkalam nirmalam śāntam tat brahma aham iti smṛtam

original: sarvabhūtādhivāsaṃ ca yad bhūteṣu vasaty adhi /
analyzed: sarva bhūta adhivāsam ca yat bhūteṣu vasati adhi

original: sarvānugrāhakatvena tad asmy ahaṃ vāsudeva // BrbUp_22 //
analyzed: sarva anugrāhaka tvena tat asmi aham vāsudeva
